mapper.select: SELECT MENU_ID as "menuId",MENU_TITLE as "title",MENU_ICON_PATH as "icon", URL_STRING as "url",PARENT_MENU_ID as "pId" FROM AUDIT_MENU WHERE PARENT_MENU_ID=#{menuId} AND MENU_ID IN ( SELECT MENU_ID FROM audit_menu_role mr left join audit_role r on mr.role_id=r.role_id WHERE r.STATE='00A' and mr.role_id IN ( SELECT role_id FROM audit_user_role WHERE USER_ID IN ( SELECT user_id FROM audit_user WHERE USER_CODE='admin' ) ) )order by DISPLAY_INDEX

select '/common/images/icons/package_link.png' as "icon", A.*,B.* from menu_item A left join sub_sys_conf B on A.sub_sys_id=B.sub_sys_id where A.status='00A' and menu_type != '3' and partner_item_id=#{menuItemId} order by DISP_SEQ

select 'true' as "expandable",'/common/images/icons/chart_organisation.png' as "icon",org.ORG_ID as "orgId",org.ORG_NAME as "name",'0' as "isUser" from organization org where state='00A' and parent_org_id=#{orgId} and #{isUser}!='1' UNION select 'false' as "expandable",'/common/images/icons/user.png' as "icon",STAFF_ID as "orgId",STAFF_NAME as "name",'1' as "isUser" from staff_t t where staff_state='00A' and org_id=#{orgId} and #{isUser}!='1'
select org.ORG_ID as "orgId",org.ORG_NAME as "orgName" from organization org where state='00A' and parent_org_id=#{orgId}
select A.GROUP_ID "groupId",A.GROUP_NAME "groupName",A.GROUP_DESC "groupDesc" from GROUPS A where A.PARENT_GROUP_ID=#{groupId} and A.STATE = '00A' order by GROUP_ID

select A.KNOWLEDGE_TYPE_ID "knowledgeTypeId",A.KNOWLEDGE_TYPE_NAME "knowledgeTypeName",A.IS_AUDIT "isAudit" from KNOWLEDGE_TYPE A where A.PARENT_KNOWLEDGE_TYPE_ID=#{knowledgeTypeId} and A.STATE != '00X' order by seq_id
select A.ROLE_ID "roleId",A.ROLE_NAME "roleName",A.ROLE_DESC "roleDesc" from ROLES A where A.PARENT_ROLE_ID=#{roleId} and A.ROLE_STATE = '00A' order by ROLE_ID

select A.PRIVILEGE_ID "privilegeId",A.PRIVILEGE_NAME "privilegeName",A.PRIVILEGE_DESC "privilegeDesc" from PRIVILEGE A where A.PARENT_PRIVILEGE_ID=#{privilegeId} and A.STATE = '00A' order by A.PRIVILEGE_ID

select '/common/images/icons/key_power_16.png' as "icon",A.*,(select PRIVILEGE_NAME from PRIVILEGE where PRIVILEGE_ID=#{privilegeId}) as PARENT_PRIVILEGE_NAME from PRIVILEGE A where A.PARENT_PRIVILEGE_ID=#{privilegeId} and A.STATE = '00A' order by A.PRIVILEGE_ID

select A.GROUP_ID "groupId",A.GROUP_NAME "groupName",A.GROUP_DESC "groupDesc",D.STAFF_GROUP_ID "relateId" from GROUPS A left join (select C.STAFF_GROUP_ID,C.GROUP_ID from STAFF_T B,STAFF_GROUP C where C.STATE = '00A' and B.STAFF_ID = C.STAFF_ID AND B.STAFF_ID=#{relateId}) D on A.GROUP_ID = D.GROUP_ID where A.PARENT_GROUP_ID=#{groupId} and A.STATE = '00A' order by A.GROUP_ID

select A.GROUP_ID "groupId",A.GROUP_NAME "groupName",A.GROUP_DESC "groupDesc",D.GROUP_ROLE_ID "relateId" from GROUPS A left join (select C.GROUP_ROLE_ID,C.GROUP_ID from ROLES B,GROUP_ROLE C where C.STATE = '00A' and B.ROLE_ID = C.ROLE_ID AND B.ROLE_ID=#{relateId}) D on A.GROUP_ID = D.GROUP_ID where A.PARENT_GROUP_ID=#{groupId} and A.STATE = '00A' order by A.GROUP_ID

select A.ROLE_ID "roleId",A.ROLE_NAME "roleName",A.ROLE_DESC "roleDesc",D.STAFF_ROLE_ID "relateId" from ROLES A left join (select C.STAFF_ROLE_ID,C.ROLE_ID from STAFF_T B,STAFF_ROLE C where C.STATE = '00A' and B.STAFF_ID = C.STAFF_ID AND B.STAFF_ID=#{relateId}) D on A.ROLE_ID = D.ROLE_ID where A.PARENT_ROLE_ID=#{roleId} and A.ROLE_STATE = '00A' order by A.ROLE_ID

select A.ROLE_ID "roleId",A.ROLE_NAME "roleName",A.ROLE_DESC "roleDesc",D.GROUP_ROLE_ID "relateId" from ROLES A left join (select C.GROUP_ROLE_ID,C.ROLE_ID from GROUPS B,GROUP_ROLE C where C.STATE = '00A' and B.GROUP_ID = C.GROUP_ID AND B.GROUP_ID=#{relateId}) D on A.ROLE_ID = D.ROLE_ID where A.PARENT_ROLE_ID=#{roleId} and A.ROLE_STATE = '00A' order by A.ROLE_ID

select A.PRIVILEGE_ID "privilegeId",A.PRIVILEGE_NAME "privilegeName",A.PRIVILEGE_DESC "privilegeDesc", PRIVILEGE_TYPE "privilegeType",D.STAFF_PRIVILEGE_ID "relateId" from PRIVILEGE A left join (select C.STAFF_PRIVILEGE_ID,C.PRIVILEGE_ID from STAFF_T B,STAFF_PRIVILEGE C where C.STATE = '00A' and B.STAFF_ID = C.STAFF_ID AND B.STAFF_ID=#{relateId}) D on A.PRIVILEGE_ID = D.PRIVILEGE_ID where A.PARENT_PRIVILEGE_ID=#{privilegeId} and A.STATE = '00A' order by A.PRIVILEGE_ID

select A.PRIVILEGE_ID "privilegeId",A.PRIVILEGE_NAME "privilegeName",A.PRIVILEGE_DESC "privilegeDesc", PRIVILEGE_TYPE "privilegeType",D.ROLE_PRIVILEGE_ID "relateId" from PRIVILEGE A left join (select C.ROLE_PRIVILEGE_ID,C.PRIVILEGE_ID from ROLES B,ROLE_PRIVILEGE C where C.STATE = '00A' and B.ROLE_ID = C.ROLE_ID AND B.ROLE_ID=#{relateId}) D on A.PRIVILEGE_ID = D.PRIVILEGE_ID where A.PARENT_PRIVILEGE_ID=#{privilegeId} and A.STATE = '00A' order by A.PRIVILEGE_ID

select A.PRIVILEGE_ID "privilegeId",A.PRIVILEGE_NAME "privilegeName",A.PRIVILEGE_DESC "privilegeDesc", PRIVILEGE_TYPE "privilegeType",D.GROUP_PRIVILEGE_ID "relateId" from PRIVILEGE A left join (select C.GROUP_PRIVILEGE_ID,C.PRIVILEGE_ID from GROUPS B,GROUP_PRIVILEGE C where C.STATE = '00A' and B.GROUP_ID = C.GROUP_ID AND B.GROUP_ID=#{relateId}) D on A.PRIVILEGE_ID = D.PRIVILEGE_ID where A.PARENT_PRIVILEGE_ID=#{privilegeId} and A.STATE = '00A' order by A.PRIVILEGE_ID
select 'true' as 'expandable', 0 as 'isDetail', dm_host_group_id as 'valueId', name as 'name' from dm_host_group
select 'false' as 'expandable', 1 as 'isDetail', DM_HOST_GROUP_DETAIL_ID as 'valueId', DM_A_HOST_ID as 'name' from dm_host_group_detail WHERE DM_HOST_GROUP_ID = #{valueId}
